name: Classic Spaghetti and Meatballs
method:
Step 1: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Step 2: Mix ground beef, bread crumbs, egg, salt, and pepper. Form into meatballs.
Step 3: Brown meatballs in a skillet, then simmer in tomato sauce.
Step 4: Serve meatballs and sauce over cooked spaghetti.

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
method:
Step 1: Marinate chicken in lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, and rosemary.
Step 2: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Step 3: Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side, until fully cooked.
Step 4: Serve with additional lemon wedges.

name: Vegetarian Chickpea Curry
method:
Step 1: Saute onions and garlic in a large pot until softened.
Step 2: Add tomatoes, coconut milk, chickpeas, and curry powder.
Step 3: Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Step 4: Serve over rice or with naan bread.

name: Beef Stir-Fry with Vegetables
method:
Step 1: Slice beef into thin strips and marinate in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Step 2: Stir-fry beef in a hot skillet until browned, then remove from pan.
Step 3: Stir-fry bell peppers and broccoli until tender-crisp.
Step 4: Return beef to skillet, toss everything together, and serve hot.

name: Baked Salmon with Lemon Dill Sauce
method:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with foil.
Step 2: Place salmon on baking sheet, sprinkle with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Step 3: Bake for 12-15 minutes until salmon is flaky.
Step 4: Meanwhile, melt butter in a saucepan, add garlic, dill, and lemon juice to make sauce.
Step 5: Serve salmon with lemon dill sauce drizzled on top.
